# Portfolio Project - Data Science & Analytics

## Project Overview
Modern Next.js portfolio website for data science and business analytics professional.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- MDX for blog content
- Dark mode support

## Project Structure
- `/app` - Next.js App Router pages
- `/components` - React components
- `/content/blog` - MDX blog posts
- `/public` - Static assets

## Coding Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow responsive design principles
- Implement accessibility best practices
- Use Tailwind CSS utility classes
- Keep components modular and reusable

## Content Focus
- Data science and business analytics
- Python, SQL, R, Power BI expertise
- Data engineering (dbt, Airflow, Spark, BigQuery)
- Project showcases with business impact
- Learning journey documentation (104-week roadmap)
